Expeditious Retreat

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Gain Dash immediately and as a bonus action on each of your turns until this spell ends.

Expeditious Retreat is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Expeditious Retreat is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
